item.title: Planting trees is not enough if they arenâ€™t native
item.description: When we discuss rewilding and land restoration, ensuring that native trees are used is equally important. I wasn’t aware of this when I planted Conocarpus trees at home almost 10 years ago. No birds or animals have ever come to the tree. I also realised much later that these trees aren’t good for humans either. They cause allergic reactions in many people. It’s been so many years now that I feel bad about cutting them down, but maybe I should.
